description:
## What's Wrong
`just release-patch` / `just release-minor` use `sed -i` in a way that's GNU-sed specific; BSD sed (macOS outside nix) requires an extension argument.

## Where
- justfile:67-68, 87-88

## Why It Matters
Contributors running release scripts on macOS without nix will hit a broken release flow.

## Suggested Fix
- Use a portable approach: `perl -pi -e`, or detect BSD vs GNU sed.
- Consider moving release logic to `scripts/release.sh` with explicit checks.

## Acceptance
- Release scripts work on macOS + Linux without requiring GNU sed.
title: Release scripts: make version bump portable across macOS/Linux
